definition: a person who causes liquor to come out of a container : one who draws (see draw entry 1 sense 1b) liquor
one that draws (see draw entry 1 sense transitive 7) a bill of exchange or order for payment or makes a promissory note
a sliding box or receptacle opened by pulling out and closed by pushing in
examples: kept the letters in the top drawer of her dresser

definition: an article of clothing (such as underwear) for the lower body
